wikipedia_page.main: Michael Martyn (19 January 1936 – 26 November 2017) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s and 1960s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Leigh (Heritage № 640), as a second-row.

response: * Most career tries: 189 by Mick Martyn, 1954–67
The son of the rugby league footballer Tommy Martyn Sr, and the nephew of the Leigh and Great Britain rugby league footballer Mick Martyn,
